    ğŸ‘‹ Hi, everyone! I am a junior undergraduate student at Harbin Institute of Technology, China, currently working under the supervision of Prof. Dianbo Sui. My research interests lie in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Large Language Models (LLMs), with a particular focus on model editing and debiasing techniques.

    Previously, I was a competitive programming (CP) contestant and a leader of the ACM club, working under the guidance of Prof. Kaikun Dong.
